title: JungleCasino
author: JungleCasino
content: JungleCasino.ioDiscord Twitter Medium Reddit Telegram Live Support GitbookJungle Casino is an innovative decentralized betting platform: a DeFi casino on the blockchain, a fair casino, and most importantly, 100% on-chain.Itâ€™s a fair and verifiable betting environment that allows you to play without registration, ensuring complete privacy. All transactions are verified on the blockchain, guaranteeing maximum transparency and fairness without the need for centralized registrations or deposits. Betting outcomes are ensured by Chainlink VRF, odds are public and visible in the contracts, so the probabilities of winning cannot be manipulated. Finally, a gaming experience without compromise!Jungle Casino strives to maintain the lowest profit margin possible (1% on some games), which is very low compared to most existing platforms, meaning you have a better chance of winning.Initially, the casino offers two options: playing on the Polygon blockchain or USDT. They will soon accept BTC for Jackpot and Lottery and many other cryptocurrencies.Jungle Casino focuses solely on cryptocurrencies because the blockchain provides players with absolute financial discretion through entirely anonymous processes. You can play without registration, no banking information is required, and your money stays in your wallet. Each game only involves the amount wagered, and winnings are paid instantly.How many players have been denied the right to recover their blocked funds from their accounts? With Jungle Casino, thereâ€™s no need for documentation or confusing conditions to retrieve your funds; everything is automated, and the platform has no access to your money.What Jungle Casino is going to offer thatâ€™s new and original, in addition to the gaming platform which is already complete in itself, is the opportunity to invest in the casino through the minting of NFTs or tokens.For the Halloween launch, we have created a themed game and we have set up a Jackpot.Affiliation programJoin one of the most competitive affiliate programs in the field. Whether you are experienced or a beginner in affiliation, take advantage of our program to maximize your earnings. Your traffic will be efficiently optimized as our expertise and integrity ensure high customer loyalty, ensuring continuous profits through our commission plans. Benefit from a revenue share of up to 50% simply via your affiliate link connected to your wallet. No identity verification (KYC) required for players as well as affiliatesStay tuned to learn more about this very soon!JungleCasino.ioDiscord Twitter Medium Reddit Telegram Live Support Gitbook

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Great decentralized casino! You are offering decentralized games that is fresh to everyone here. The coming soon games looks like a very promising.Are you the one developing all the games since I donâ€™t see this games in other casino even on some decentralized casino like yours. And are you planning to introduce VIP system to reward your loyal customers because this feature is a crucial factor for players to choose your casino. Players doesnâ€™t give much importance on decentralized game since centralized casino have license to make an assurance that they are a legit casino.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: Welcome aboard mate. Just visited the site, and it looks awesome. So it seems we have two options so far - polygon wallet and MetMask wallet using which we can connect and start playing immediately. Now that is the beauty of decentralized casino. I am not sure from which country you have got the license to run the casino because that can affect the business in the future if revenue and total transaction are rising continuously. They gonna knock the door for sure. From what I see, you have launched a few games right now. There is a section that shows a countdown timer with "coming soon" games and slots. Most of the support is from Discord and Telegram, well seems quick and easy. As expected KYC is not there, I hope it remains the same no matter what consider you stay as "decentralized" economy all the time.Â  Good luck guys.

The coming soon games looks like a very promising.Are you the one developing all the games since I donâ€™t see this games in other casino even on some decentralized casino like yours. And are you planning to introduce VIP system to reward your loyal customers because this feature is a crucial factor for players to choose your casino. Players doesnâ€™t give much importance on decentralized game since centralized casino have license to make an assurance that they are a legit casino.Thank you so much for your encouragement! We are indeed working on developing our own games to offer something unique to our players. Regarding the VIP system, we believe that due to the low house edge we offer, every player can feel like a VIP compared to centralized casinos. We value all our customers and strive to provide an exceptional and fair gaming experience to everyone.

comments.body: Quote from: so98nn on October 29, 2023, 10:53:11 AMWelcome aboard mate. Just visited the site, and it looks awesome. So it seems we have two options so far - polygon wallet and MetMask wallet using which we can connect and start playing immediately. Now that is the beauty of decentralized casino. I am not sure from which country you have got the license to run the casino because that can affect the business in the future if revenue and total transaction are rising continuously. They gonna knock the door for sure. From what I see, you have launched a few games right now. There is a section that shows a countdown timer with "coming soon" games and slots. Most of the support is from Discord and Telegram, well seems quick and easy. As expected KYC is not there, I hope it remains the same no matter what consider you stay as "decentralized" economy all the time.Â  Good luck guys. Indeed, we encourage the use of Metamask with a dedicated wallet, but with Wallet Connect, players can also use other wallets. We are registered in Costa Rica. There are already some slots and dice games available, but indeed, other games are announced very soon, as shown by the countdown on our site.We are committed to staying in a decentralized economy because we are very attached to it. This is part of our fundamental values, and we will continue to operate respecting these principles to offer the best possible experience to our players while respecting their autonomy and privacy. Thank you again for your encouragement and support!

comments.author: JungleCasino
comments.body: QuoteWelcome to the forum and I'm really curious about the game that I can't find to any site, does your team develop your own games too?Having a more reward for every bracket of players can encourage them to stay on the site especially if they feel that you really appreciate them and valued them as a partner. Hoping to see good reviews from this site before I try it, want to explore the games as well. Thank you for your welcome and curiosity! Yes, we develop our own games, and if you end up finding them elsewhere, it will be because we have provided them to the platform. We strive to create and offer unique experiences to our players so that they find something new and exciting here. We greatly appreciate everyone's participation and thoughts; they are essential for allowing us to improve and innovate continuously. We are looking forward to seeing you explore and enjoy our games!

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Welcome mate. I have accessed your website and I find it interesting. Although I do not find decentralised casinos to be genuine as I have encountered some issues in the past with them.. I have friends who lost coins to scammers all in the name of decentralised casinos. I checked as well to see them for myself. But what I saw made me wonder of you could survive the heat here..I think you should make budget for promotion and content creation.
